name: Wizard and Jabik: Butterflies
description:
Meet the Wizard - a longtime dreamer and esthete.
During all his life he had a fantasy to make a genuine collection of butterflies, but he lived in cold lands where nothing was alive. As soon as he retired, he moved to the heat, where he found his friend Jabik (the froggy).
Together they formed an excellent team for hunting rare specimens in the most unexpected conditions.
Catch all the butterflies with the Jabik and add to the Wizard's collection!

Controls: 
A/D - Movement 
LMB - Launch tongue
